Author: goldkingcoiner
Title: [ANN][ICO] BLOCKKONNECT | Blockchain and Technology Forum | Monetization option
Body: Ok so your team is composed of badly cut out people with some fade out from photoshop (you still can see some background). Their Linkin and twitter profiles are generic and empty, Your whitepaper has many easy mistakes, and a lot of doublespeak. Your application form accepts only gmail or yahoo account emails and you promise, without any basis, the ico will be on exchanges in less than 2 months. And you want to pay users with XBT. Oh and all your team members seem to have roughly the same amount of followers and they are all the same followers. HMMMMM  I smell a scam.  Ok so first of all, seriously? Thats just lazy: http://oi66.tinypic.com/2zg4s28.jpg  Second of all your team members have around 430-460 followers while having only 70-90 tweets as well as 70-90 followings. Going by the fact they all suspiciously have an account since may 2018, that would give them 3 months to make those followers. Thats 5 followers a day. Math does not add up.  Try harder next scam.

I'm too verified the alert from goldkingcoiner about strage coincidence... All team  images  that  have a linkedin logo haven't the linkedin page  .... Like already write all this is high risk of scam project. Any comment from OP? Thanks

Author: machineskill
Title: [ANN][ICO] BLOCKKONNECT | Blockchain and Technology Forum | Monetization option
Body: our project is completely unique, Blockkonnect has implemented many featured tools with itself which you can never get in other platforms,Hence this makes the Blockkonnect project different and unique among all. Here are those key features:  DISCUSS — Here at Blockkonnect you can create your own threads, discuss according to your own wish on your favourite topics and earn according to your rank. TIP — Blockkonnect is the only platform which provides an opportunity to reward tips to posters in the form of XBT tokens if you find the post is worthy or satisfied with users post or someone’s answers. UPVOTE — You can upvote answers which can motivate others for writing even better next time. PROMOTE — You can promote and advertise your projects by paying XBT tokens and all those XBT tokens wil be rewarded to the posters for their activities and activeness IMPORTANT — You can put your important queries and questions in Request Zone.Where interested people can have a look and answer those questions,its similar to quora but here both posters and replier will earn XBT tokens. TRENDING — We keep a trending list which will show those topics and threads being more discussed about people according to our algorithm.  i would like to request you to please read our litepaper once its in short and simple way..for the prevenction of fake accounts we will block duplicate ip..one ip one account we wil provide.if anyone uses wifi they wil have single ips so we will ask them to submit kyc..
